name: Prescribing of high cost tramadol preparations
title: high cost tramadol preparations
compared with prescribing of all tramadol preparations
description: Items prescribed of high cost tramadol preparations
as a proportion of all tramadol items prescribed
why_it_matters: Modified release and non-standard tramadol preparations vary widely in cost. Generic tramadol 50mg capsules are low-cost.
Ideally modified-release and other high cost preparations should be reserved for patients who have compliance issues.
